zh-cn: 中华民国第十六任总统副总统选举

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第8次正、副总统公民直选，于2024年1月13日举行。此次选举由民主进步党的赖清德与萧美琴当选，是中华民国总统开放公民直选以来，首度由同一政党连续三次获胜。
description.en: The 8th direct presidential and vice-presidential election in the Republic of China, held on January 13, 2024. Lai Ching-te and Hsiao Bi-khim of the Democratic Progressive Party won, marking the first time the same political party has won three consecutive presidential elections since direct elections began.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、医师，时任副总统及民主进步党主席，在2024年总统选举中与搭档萧美琴胜选，成为中华民国第十六任总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, serving as Vice President and Chairman of the Democratic Progressive Party at the time. He, along with his running mate Hsiao Bi-khim, won the 2024 presidential election to become the 16th President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、外交官，曾任中华民国驻美国代表，在2024年总统选举中作为赖清德的副手搭档胜选，成为中华民国第十六任副总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and diplomat who formerly served as the ROC's Representative to the United States. She was Lai Ching-te's running mate in the 2024 presidential election and was elected as the 16th Vice President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、前警官，时任新北市市长，代表中国国民党参选2024年总统选举但最终落败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and former police officer, serving as the Mayor of New Taipei City at the time. He represented the Kuomintang in the 2024 presidential election but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、媒体人，时任中国广播公司董事长，作为侯友宜的副手搭档代表中国国民党参选2024年副总统选举但最终落败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and media personality, serving as the chairman of the Broadcasting Corporation of China at the time. He was Hou Yu-ih's running mate representing the Kuomintang in the 2024 vice-presidential election but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、医师，时任台湾民众党主席，代表该党参选2024年总统选举但最终落败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and physician, serving as the Chairman of the Taiwan People's Party at the time. He represented the party in the 2024 presidential election but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、企业家，时任不分区立法委员，作为柯文哲的副手搭档代表台湾民众党参选2024年副总统选举但最终落败。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and businesswoman, serving as a legislator-at-large at the time. She was Ko Wen-je's running mate representing the Taiwan People's Party in the 2024 vice-presidential election but was ultimately defeated.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，鸿海科技集团创办人。于2023年宣布以无党籍身份展开总统选举公民连署，并在通过门槛后于登记参选前宣布退选。
description.en: Taiwanese entrepreneur and founder of Hon Hai Technology Group (Foxconn). In 2023, he announced an independent run for president via a citizen petition. After meeting the signature threshold, he withdrew before the official registration deadline.

description.zh-cn: 台湾资深艺人及作家，作为郭台铭的副手搭档参与总统选举连署，后于登记前共同退选。
description.en: A veteran Taiwanese artist and author who was Terry Gou's running mate for the presidential election petition, later withdrawing together before the official registration.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第14、15任总统。因已连任一次，依据《中华民国宪法增修条文》规定，不得于2024年竞选连任。
description.en: The 14th and 15th President of the Republic of China. Having already been re-elected once, she was ineligible to run for re-election in 2024 according to the Additional Articles of the Constitution of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前总统，以见证人身份参与了2024年选举前的“蓝白合”协商过程。
description.en: Former President of the Republic of China who participated as a witness in the 'Blue-White Cooperation' negotiations before the 2024 election.

description.zh-cn: 时任中国国民党主席，主导了该党2024年总统候选人的征召过程以及与台湾民众党的“蓝白合”协商。
description.en: The incumbent Chairman of the Kuomintang, who led the party's candidate nomination process and the 'Blue-White Cooperation' negotiations with the Taiwan People's Party for the 2024 election.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，亲民党主席。在2024年总统选举前夕表态支持国民党候选人侯友宜。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician and the Chairman of the People First Party. He endorsed KMT candidate Hou Yu-ih on the eve of the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 时任中共中央总书记兼中国国家主席。其关于两岸关系的言论，尤其是“祖国统一是历史必然”的表述，被视为对2024年台湾选举的重要外部影响因素。
description.en: The incumbent General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of the PRC. His remarks on cross-strait relations, especially the statement that 'the reunification of the motherland is a historical inevitability,' were seen as a significant external influencing factor on the 2024 Taiwan election.

description.zh-cn: 时任美国总统。他在台湾选举后表示“我们不支持台湾独立”，重申了美国的长期政策立场。
description.en: The incumbent President of the United States. After the Taiwan election, he stated, 'We do not support independence,' reiterating the long-standing U.S. policy position.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，在2024年总统选举中由赖清德与萧美琴代表参选并获胜。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan. Represented by Lai Ching-te and Hsiao Bi-khim, who won the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的主要政党之一，在2024年总统选举中由侯友宜与赵少康代表参选但落败。
description.en: One of the major political parties in Taiwan. Represented by Hou Yu-ih and Chao Shao-kang, who were defeated in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党之一，在2024年总统选举中由柯文哲与吴欣盈代表参选但落败。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan. Represented by Ko Wen-je and Wu Hsin-ying, who were defeated in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的政党之一，党主席宋楚瑜在2024年总统选举中表态支持国民党候选人侯友宜。
description.en: A political party in Taiwan. Its chairman, James Soong, endorsed KMT candidate Hou Yu-ih in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 被指通过经济施压、散播假讯息、制造假民调等方式介入2024年台湾总统选举。
description.en: Accused of interfering in the 2024 Taiwan presidential election through economic pressure, disinformation campaigns, and fabricating opinion polls.

description.zh-cn: 指2024年总统选举前，代表蓝营的中国国民党与代表白营的台湾民众党之间就总统候选人整合进行的协商过程。该过程历经数月，最终因双方在候选人产生方式上无法达成共识而破局。
description.en: Refers to the negotiation process between the Kuomintang (representing the Blue camp) and the Taiwan People's Party (representing the White camp) to form a joint presidential ticket before the 2024 election. The months-long process ultimately failed due to disagreements on the candidate selection method.

description.zh-cn: 2024年总统选举前，由郭台铭于台北君悦酒店邀请侯友宜、柯文哲进行的最后一次公开在野整合协商。国民党主席朱立伦与前总统马英九亦到场，但会谈最终不欢而散，标志着“蓝白合作”彻底破局。
description.en: The final public opposition integration negotiation before the 2024 presidential election, hosted by Terry Gou at the Grand Hyatt Taipei for Hou Yu-ih and Ko Wen-je. KMT Chairman Eric Chu and former President Ma Ying-jeou also attended. The talks ended acrimoniously, marking the definitive collapse of the 'Blue-White Cooperation'.

en: New Taipei City kindergarten drugging case

description.zh-cn: 一起发生于新北市板桥区私立幼儿园的事件，教师被指控疑似喂食儿童巴比妥酸盐类及苯二氮䓬类药物。此案在选举期间对时任新北市长侯友宜的选情造成了严重的负面影响。
description.en: An incident at a private kindergarten in Banqiao District, New Taipei City, where teachers were accused of allegedly administering barbiturates and benzodiazepines to children. The case had a significant negative impact on the election campaign of then-New Taipei City Mayor Hou Yu-ih.

description.zh-cn: 民主进步党中央执行委员会于2023年4月12日正式公告提名时任党主席赖清德代表该党参与2024年总统选举。
description.en: On April 12, 2023, the Central Executive Committee of the Democratic Progressive Party officially announced the nomination of its incumbent chairman, Lai Ching-te, to represent the party in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党中央常务委员会于2023年5月17日正式通过征召时任新北市市长侯友宜代表该党参与2024年总统选举。
description.en: On May 17, 2023, the Central Standing Committee of the Kuomintang officially approved the nomination of then-New Taipei City Mayor Hou Yu-ih to represent the party in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 台湾民众党中央委员会于2023年5月17日正式公告提名时任党主席柯文哲代表该党参与2024年总统选举。
description.en: On May 17, 2023, the Central Committee of the Taiwan People's Party officially announced the nomination of its incumbent chairman, Ko Wen-je, to represent the party in the 2024 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 赖清德于2023年11月20日宣布，由时任驻美代表萧美琴担任其副总统候选人搭档，组成“赖萧配”。
description.en: On November 20, 2023, Lai Ching-te announced that then-Representative to the U.S. Hsiao Bi-khim would be his running mate for vice president, forming the 'Lai-Hsiao ticket'.

description.zh-cn: 侯友宜于2023年11月24日宣布，由中国广播公司董事长赵少康担任其副总统候选人搭档，组成“侯赵配”。
description.en: On November 24, 2023, Hou Yu-ih announced that Broadcasting Corporation of China chairman Chao Shao-kang would be his running mate for vice president, forming the 'Hou-Chao ticket'.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲于2023年11月24日宣布，由党籍不分区立委吴欣盈担任其副总统候选人搭档，组成“柯吴配”。
description.en: On November 24, 2023, Ko Wen-je announced that TPP legislator-at-large Cynthia Wu would be his running mate for vice president, forming the 'Ko-Wu ticket'.

description.zh-cn: 郭台铭于2023年9月14日宣布由资深艺人赖佩霞担任其副总统候选人搭档，共同展开公民连署，后于登记前退选。
description.en: On September 14, 2023, Terry Gou announced veteran artist Lai Pei-hsia as his vice-presidential running mate to jointly launch a citizen petition, but they later withdrew before the official registration.

description.zh-cn: 赖清德与萧美琴在选举中获得5,586,019票（得票率40.05%），成功当选中华民国第16任总统。
description.en: Lai Ching-te and Hsiao Bi-khim won the election with 5,586,019 votes (40.05%) and were successfully elected as the 16th President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 侯友宜与赵少康在选举中获得4,671,021票（得票率33.49%），未能当选。
description.en: Hou Yu-ih and Chao Shao-kang received 4,671,021 votes (33.49%) in the election and were not elected.

description.zh-cn: 柯文哲与吴欣盈在选举中获得3,690,466票（得票率26.46%），未能当选。
description.en: Ko Wen-je and Wu Hsin-ying received 3,690,466 votes (26.46%) in the election and were not elected.

description.zh-cn: 郭台铭及其搭档赖佩霞虽通过公民连署门槛获得参选资格，但在2023年11月24日候选人登记截止日当天共同发表声明，宣布不登记参选，退出本次选举。
description.en: Although Terry Gou and his running mate Lai Pei-hsia qualified for the election by meeting the citizen petition threshold, they jointly issued a statement on the registration deadline, November 24, 2023, announcing their decision not to register and to withdraw from the election.

description.zh-cn: 蔡英文在完成八年总统任期后，成功将政权交棒给同属民主进步党的赖清德，打破了台湾总统直选以来难以由同一政党连续执政超过八年的“魔咒”。
description.en: After completing her eight-year presidential term, Tsai Ing-wen successfully handed over power to Lai Ching-te of the same Democratic Progressive Party, breaking the 'curse' where no single party had managed to hold the presidency for more than eight consecutive years since direct elections began in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年总统选举前，中国国民党与台湾民众党就总统候选人整合进行了持续数月的“蓝白合作”协商，但最终因无法达成共识而破局。
description.en: Before the 2024 presidential election, the Kuomintang and the Taiwan People's Party engaged in several months of 'Blue-White Cooperation' negotiations to form a joint presidential ticket, but the talks ultimately failed due to a lack of consensus.

description.zh-cn: 在台北君悦酒店举行的公开协商是“蓝白合作”的最后尝试，会谈因多方分歧而不欢而散，直接导致了在野整合的彻底破局。
description.en: The public negotiation at the Grand Hyatt Taipei was the final attempt at 'Blue-White Cooperation.' The meeting ended acrimoniously due to multiple disagreements, directly leading to the complete collapse of the opposition coalition effort.

description.zh-cn: 前总统马英九出面担任见证人，促成了侯友宜、柯文哲、朱立伦之间的第二次政党协商，并达成了以民调决定人选的初步共识。
description.en: Former President Ma Ying-jeou acted as a witness, facilitating the second round of party negotiations between Hou Yu-ih, Ko Wen-je, and Eric Chu, which resulted in a preliminary consensus to use opinion polls to decide the ticket.

description.zh-cn: 该案于2023年5月爆发，由于事发地为新北市且侯友宜时任市长，其市府的处理方式引发争议，对他的总统选情造成了严重的负面冲击。
description.en: The case broke out in May 2023. As the incident occurred in New Taipei City and Hou Yu-ih was the incumbent mayor, his administration's handling of the situation sparked controversy, severely damaging his presidential campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国被指控通过多种方式介入2024年台湾总统选举，包括经济施压（如终止部分ECFA商品关税优惠）、散播假新闻和假民调、资助特定人士赴中国大陆旅游并为其支持的候选人拉票等，企图影响选举结果。
description.en: The People's Republic of China was accused of interfering in the 2024 Taiwan presidential election through various means, including economic pressure (such as terminating tariff concessions for some ECFA products), spreading fake news and polls, and funding travel to mainland China for certain individuals to canvass for its favored candidates, in an attempt to influence the election outcome.

description.zh-cn: 在郭台铭宣布参选后，中国大陆当局于2023年10月对其创办的鸿海集团（富士康）展开税务及用地调查，此举被广泛解读为北京方面对其参选施加政治压力的警告。
description.en: After Terry Gou announced his candidacy, mainland Chinese authorities launched tax and land use investigations into his company, Hon Hai Precision Industry (Foxconn), in October 2023. This move was widely interpreted as a warning from Beijing to exert political pressure on his campaign.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在2024年新年贺词中表示，中国大陆与台湾的统一是“历史必然”，其对台措辞被认为比往年更为严厉，为此次选举增添了紧张的外部因素。
description.en: In his 2024 New Year's address, Xi Jinping stated that the reunification of mainland China and Taiwan is a 'historical inevitability.' His rhetoric towards Taiwan was considered more severe than in previous years, adding a tense external factor to this election.

description.zh-cn: 亲民党主席宋楚瑜在选举前夕公开表态支持中国国民党总统候选人侯友宜。
description.en: James Soong, Chairman of the People First Party, publicly endorsed Kuomintang presidential candidate Hou Yu-ih on the eve of the election.

description.zh-cn: 在台湾选举结果出炉后，美国总统乔·拜登被问及此事时回应称“我们不支持（台湾）独立”，此番表态重申了美国的长期政策，并引起国际关注。
description.en: After the Taiwan election results were announced, U.S. President Joe Biden, when asked about the matter, responded, 'We do not support independence,' a statement that reiterated long-standing U.S. policy and drew international attention.
